page.title: 15AVENING MILL AND POND
page.content:
The Avening mill pond and mill are on the right as you come down Tetbury Hill, just past M.& J.Foodstores. Down the lane, on the right is a fast-flowing stream and on your left is the mill. Much of the mill is old but a new extension has been built. The mill used to be a corn mill but now it is used for paper distribution. It serves the whole of England and there are many big lorries going down the lane; seven times our garden wall has been knocked downj. The paper is of varying sizes, colours and shapes and the people there work very hard. a bit farther down the lane on your left is an orange skip full of waste paper. Beyond that you can look into the dark pond full of trout and eels.
